phrases: Arima-sensei, why do you want to perform at the Culture Festival?
I have got this horrible friend.
And since she is feeling so sorry for herself...
I want to punch her, just once.
That is when I got the feeling.
Is not he her big brother's rival?
Elohim, Essaim... Elohim, Essaim... I implore you...
Could not have gotten off to a better start!
You have got to be kidding me.
In the short time that I had not seen her...
I was all stiff from nerves,
I can hear both my own playing, and Arima-sensei's playing, too.
All that practice did not lie.
I can still hear the sound of the piano.
You are in my way, so...
You are supposed to be supporting me...
So why are you dumping all this pressure on me?
This is totally different from the way we practiced!
Both the rhythm, and this aching sense of atmosphere...
The tempo's starting to take off.
He is playing the bass, but he is starting to consume the melody.
What are you going to do, Nagi?
Are you going to let Kousei have his way with you?
Aiza's kid sister is competing with him!
No matter how he goads her, or how he drags her along in his wake, she is keeping up.
You are the star of this stage.
Do not even give him an inch!
That is right... in a waltz...
The melody shifts to the bottom part!
Two months ago, I would have been left behind.
All that time... did not go to waste.
The time I devoted to playing the piano... is paying off now!
He is got a heart of steel.
He is like a robot, is not he?
Kousei Arima is no Chogokin robot.
He does not have a heart of steel.
When I touched it, his hand was warm.
The moment I touched it... that moment... was so nostalgic.
As the bass line player, he is magnificent.
He knows her personality, he is grasped her habits, he is goading her,
leading her on, and backing her up.
He is putting his partner in the zone.
Those roasted sweet potatoes we shared sure were good!
Those pork buns we had on our way home... they sure were good!
This is, without a doubt... their waltz.
I only started playing the piano because I wanted my beloved big brother's attention.
for the last few weeks, I have been peering into the abyss, just a little bit.
I went without food or sleep to immerse myself in music.
And it was so painful... so painful to look my powerless self in the eye,
that I wanted to run away.
You felt the same way, did not you, brother?
It is important to play for someone else.
But you know what... that is not what I want to see!
It is not in you to lose your way.
Run up those stairs like you are skipping lightly.
Just like you did that day... once again, make yourself chase after that back of his!
Just like Nagi saw herself in you,
you have been seeing yourself in Nagi, have not you...
Unlike everybody else, I do not yearn to become a pro,
and I am not prepared to give all of myself to music,
but there are people who will listen.
There are people I want to play for.
There are people that I love.
So... I want to be here.
Is not that a good enough reason to want to play, for now?
What am I doing, looking up at the stage from the audience?
I am supposed to be up there, are not I?
Emi and Nagi... why does your playing move people...
I am exhausted, but I want to go on playing till I collapse.
Was I able to confront it with sincerity?
Why are the sounds you make so colorful, and so beautiful?
I think I am going to cry.
All the months of agony, screaming,
There is a moment when you are rewarded for all that.
Do you think it reached him?
Were you able to give her that punch?
A performance that will not be forgotten.
The girl who yearns to go onstage at the opera house.
What are you going to do, Takeshi?
Even as she lost her way and suffered,
big-bro complex and all, Nagi climbed up that stairway.
How long are you planning to sit around twiddling your thumbs?
Did not you get anything from that?
Are you planning to just sit tight here?
That was a great duet you played!
It did not move me one bit, okay?
I am not the one who is amazing.
Is not it too thrilling for words, watching somebody grow?
So that is why you placed that kid under my wing.
You know what, since you guys started coming over,
I have been enjoying myself like there is no tomorrow!
Damn you, do not grab hold of my kid sister!
I said it right, did not I?
I am glad you are so dense.
Why the hell were you playing a duet with Nagi!?
Well, I... I asked Nagi, as a favor...
Do not you dare look at her as a woman!
I mean, how did you get to know Arima, anyway?
He is looking after me here.
He is teaching me all kinds of things!
He is giving me all these precious experiences!
The Eastern Japan Piano Competition will begin.
And that is where I am going to give you a beatdown, got that!?
I am going to do it!
Flaunting something like that before my eyes...
How can I just let that go unanswered!?
December's going to be a pain in the butt.
Did my feelings get through to him?
He is never even said a word to me before...
What the heck is going on here...
Wh-Why were you playing a duet with Kousei... Arima?
Do not you dare drop the honorifics for Arima-sensei!
I am going to pull your hair out, you damned midget!
What kind of relationship is that!?
So do you have his contact info!?
It was so yummy, that taiyaki!
You knowing Arima... that is so unfair!
How I wonder what you are...
How I wonder what you are...
Up above the world so high...
Like a diamond in the sky...
That guy's what you call a jackass!
What do you mean a jackass!?
Making a violinist who cannot play the violin listen to this.
It is your fault that I miss it now.
I cannot commit double suicide with you.
Well, look, when we went shopping, I was the one who carried your bags.
You only tell me things after the fact.
You walk in front of me,
and I am always behind you.
At this rate, it would not be double suicide, I would be following you.
So please, give me one more chance.
Please give me another chance to stand by your side.
Please perform with me one more time.
You are the daughter of a cake shop owner who loves caneles,
and you are not the heroine of a novel.
No way am I ever going to play Ravel.
So please, perform with me one more time.
Besides, you are the one who said it.
Do you think you will be able to forget?”
The air is chilly, and as dry as can be.
The laundered sheets lend a gentleness to my surroundings.
Telling me to dream one more time.
I thought I was satisfied because my dream had come true...
And I would told myself it was enough...
Yet here you are, watering this withered heart again.
No, no, that is not what this is.
Boys are not supposed to bully girls, you know!
I am just going to dream again...
